Table 13. Characteristics of homicide, by city size, 1980-2008

Note: Detail may not sum to total due to rounding. Percentages of victim/offender relationships are based on the 63.1% of homicides for which victim/offender relationships were known. The percentages of homicides involving multiple victims or offenders were known for 69.1% of incidents.
